artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Tamura Tamekichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; large green canon in center image, with single soldier in a black uniform in center right, raising sword toward cowering figure in colorful clothing; fallen figure below a walled structure in right image, with faint burning ships at top; large plumes of white smoke on left image, with soldiers in black uniforms attacking at center left; large bomb (?) in URQ of left image; falling figure in red scarf and blue shirt in center right of left image
inscription: in center sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: OW 02154933
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of the Fall of Lüshun Port
